title: Update ticker skill.md with handoff signals
description:
Update the ticker skill definition to include handoff signal documentation for LLM agents.

Add to skill.md (or CLAUDE.md ticker section):
1. Signal types table with format and when to use
2. Human feedback reading instructions
3. Pre-declared gates (requires field) documentation

Reference docs/AGENT_HUMAN_WORKFLOW.md 'LLM/Agent Workflow Instructions' section.

Acceptance criteria:
- [ ] All 8 signal types documented
- [ ] Format examples provided
- [ ] Human feedback section documented
- [ ] Skill YAML format if applicable
